title: Sweet Chicken Sausage and Rice Skillet
directions: Heat oil in a medium skillet over medium-high heat. Add sausage, onions and garlic and sauté until onions are translucent, 3-5 minutes.
Add rice and stir to coat all grains. Add wine and sauté 1 minute. Add chicken broth and thyme. Bring mixture to a boil, stirring frequently. Remove from heat. Cover and let stand 5 minutes.
Stir in peas and grated Parmesan cheese. Serve topped with parsley and shaved Parmesan, if desired.
ingredients: 12	oz	al fresco® Sweet Italian Chicken Sausage, cut into 1/4-inch slices
